Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: cdntourist1234
Reviews.Content: Stayed for two night while at a business meeting. Hotel staff was friendly and very helpful. Rooms were great, clean. Free internet and airport shuttle. Would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Affordable Hilton Brand Hotel”
Reviews.Author: gd78
Reviews.Content: Large room, free wireless Internet, (decent) complimentary breakfast, all for a very good price. Nothing was really excellent, but for a 2 and a half stars hotel I really enjoyed.

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended - wonderful service and also seems very safe”
Reviews.Author: ctbibbins
Reviews.Content: We stayed here under the "Stay and Cruise" package. I was a little concerned about leaving my car in a parking lot for a week while out of the country, but I was reassured the moment we drove onto the property. Although we had to drive through a questionable part of town to get to the hotel, the hotel lot and the properties around it seem very safe and well-populated. My car was kept in a parking garage that was gated off and only accessible to hotel staff and guests, and it was in perfect condition when we returned. The hotel staff was very friendly and accommodating, and the hotel itself was top-notch. They had a wonderful continental breakfast in the morning, and would even prepare a bagged breakfast for guests in a hurry. The airport is nearby, but we didn't hear any planes or noisy traffic at all while we were there. Overall, we had a wonderful one-night stay at the Hampton Inn, and we will certainly be staying here if we cruise from Miami in the future.

Reviews.Title: “good for business overnighter - close to airport”
Reviews.Author: beatricepugzilla
Reviews.Content: Basic Hampton Inn - close to the airport and has free shuttle service. The front desk area and the breakfast area look like they have been renovated and are large - sleeping rooms are basic - clean but basic. The front desk staff at check in were top notch. The breakfast staff, not so much. Could have used a good cleaning and restocking. Have stayed here a number of times due to the early AM flights. Would not stay for an exteneded period of time. Seems others did the same or were travelling to the port for cruise the next day.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasure to stay at Hampton Inn & Suites - Miami Airport / Blue Lagoon”
Reviews.Author: briley1960
Reviews.Content: It was very comfortable. The staff was very helpful and nice to use. They helped us with renting a car and scheduling a shuttle to the ports for our cruise. Free wireless Internet. Good breakfast too!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel in an Ok Area.”
Reviews.Author: TLBowman
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to stay at this number 3 rated hotel on Trip Advisor.com , looking back I wonder why its rated number 3 . The hotel is clean. Itâ€™s not in a bad location. For the most part the front desk staff was nice. But I just didnâ€™t get the feeling of friendliness that I generally get when I stay at a Hilton property. Check in was stressful. I had made the decision to only use cash this trip and left all cards at home (this would be a major issue later). Evidently in Miami all hotels require a credit card at check in. Usually this is not an issue, however, I didnâ€™t bring one. So it became a bit of a tug of war with the check in clerk. I pointed out to the clerk, NO where on their website does it state they require a credit card for check in. Thankfully a friend had a card to put the charges on. But that led to another issue. I wasnâ€™t paying the full rate, but they were authâ€™ing the full rate on her card. My rate was much lower than the advertised rate. We pretty much had no choice. I paid cash for the room plus they authâ€™d $100 on her card. The clerk promised that the amount would be released upon inspection of the room. However, when we went to check out the room was never inspected. I stood there while the morning checkout clerk called the merchant services line and had the auth removed. Itâ€™s not that I didnâ€™t like the hotel, I did. I guess I just expected a bit more from all the reviews on tripadvisor.com and from my past experience with Hilton properties. The Room: I guess I am stupid and cannot read because we rode up and down the elevator trying to get the elevator to stop at the 6th floor but it would not. It was another guest who took pity on us and showed us the little sign that said to swipe the room card to access higher floorsâ€¦of course that would have been something that I thought the front desk would have told us. But after laughing at ourselves we got to our room. It was a 2 queen bed and as I stated before very clean. Our view over looked the parking lot below and further the lagoon and the airport in the distance. I had called ahead and asked on a couple of times to make sure that my room would have a fridge and microwave. I was told it would. It did not. This is one of the very few â€“ actually I canâ€™t think of another Hilton property that does not have fridgeâ€™s and microwaves in the room. But it was for only one night so not a big deal. I didnâ€™t go down for breakfast the next morning but everyone said it was ok. Just youâ€™re regular scrambled eggs, a meat and breads, juices and coffee. Check out was a lot better than the check in and I would stay here again, but next time I would be aware of the requirements for a credit card. The other thing that was a bit strange was the type of computers in the business centers. They had a lap top keypad, no mouse. I am not used to using a lap top and had some issues getting used to the computer, but that is just a personal preference. The hotel area Not bad at all. I had read it was in a bad area. There is a small shopping center right acros the street with a very good Cuban Resturant, a Publix and a couple of other stores. We ventured out beyond the hotel and I will say its in a much better then what I saw down town. The hotel is near to the airport and a cab to the port of Miami was $35 for 4 people.

Reviews.Title: “A Hotel that as Comfortable as being Home!”
Reviews.Author: lingarcastle
Reviews.Content: The Hampton-Inn Blue Lagoon staff was very friendly, helpful and went above and beyond to make our stay a very comfortable, stress free night. They help us out with great rooms, entertainment ideas, and a shuttle to the cruise line. Very close to the airport, clean, quite, great nights sleep. Highly recommend this hotel and we will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Hotel & Service”
Reviews.Author: Blue-Eyes
Reviews.Content: I was so pleased with my choice of the Hampton Inn for a one night stay prior to a cruise. As a solo traveller my choice of hotel was important to me. The complimentary shuttle from the airport was great and the front desk staff were fabulous. I felt welcome the moment I walked in the hotel and all my questions were answered in a very friendly manner. The room was clean and quiet. With an afternoon available I chose to shop at the Miami International Mall and the front desk staff called a cab for me and let me know that the fare should be in the range of $20 to $22 and I appreciated that info. Across the road from the Hampton Inn is a Starbucks, CVS, Walgreens and McDonalds. The hotel has free internet access. The front desk also arranged for a shuttle to the Port of Miami the following day which was approx a 20 to 25 minute drive away and cost $10 payable to the shuttle company. I could not have chosen a better location or hotel and would highly recommend the Hampton Inn Blue Lagoon to all travellers.

Reviews.Title: “Top team”
Reviews.Author: MauriMenezes
Reviews.Content: I traveled with my family and if I have to return to Miami I'll stay in this hotel again, excellent care and services. Breakfast, free shutlle, staff very attentive.

Reviews.Title: “Turning lemmons into lemonade”
Reviews.Author: LandriGrace
Reviews.Content: We waited 30 mins for a shuttle-but it was full when it arrived. From the time I called Edward and explained situation - he took professional control of situation-told us what cab to take and they paid for it upon arrival-upgraded us to a corner suite - large spacious room, spotless, incredible bed-beautiful decor-incredible service - stay there...you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: “Above & Beyond the call of duty”
Reviews.Author: Merc1960
Reviews.Content: This was our 4th time staying here. This is the best assembled team of honest, gracious, cheerful, service oriented staff I have had the pleasure of meeting in a long time. Management should be very proud of them. Will we stay again? You bet, without a doubt. It's like getting a big hampton hug! Hmmmmmm so nice. Thanks Hampton Blue Laggon.

Reviews.Title: “Comfort & Joy!”
Reviews.Author: hydenseek
Reviews.Content: Our family had just traveled for over 28 hours from door to door by the time we arrived at the Hampton Inn Miami-Airport Bluee Lagoon. We were tired, weary and ragged. However, we were greeted at the desk by Israel who was welcoming, solicitious and extremely polite. He made us feel right at home, pointed out local restaurants, gave us a late check-out time and directed us to the free breakfast buffett and the lovely pool. What a considerate staff and a clean and comfortable place to stay! I highly recommend this inn!

Reviews.Title: “Deal”
Reviews.Author: marcie2010
Reviews.Content: Close to the airport, nice breakfast, they have shuttle service, although I did not use it, to Airport and Dolphin Mall, nice...

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Staff and Service.”
Reviews.Author: Anddaley
Reviews.Content: As always Hampton Inn exceeded my expectations. Service and staff were great. It was a very nice touch to be ugraded to suite as well. I love you guys!! Please keep up the good work.

Reviews.Title: “The best choice in Miami !”
Reviews.Author: DGarciaM
Reviews.Content: This Hotel is by far the best Hotel for business or leisure travelers, because offers all what you may need: wireless access, breakfast, excellent location and service, wonderful beds and pillows... everything to feel safe and comfortable!!

Reviews.Title: “There is no place like home, but Hampton Inn Blue Lagoon is pretty close!”
Reviews.Author: smhernan
Reviews.Content: I stay at this particular hotel numerous time per year. The staff is exceptional every time without question. Every other time, I felt the rooms were very clean and well taken care of, however this time the bathroom was not very clean. There was hair on the floor and I felt the cleaning must have been rushed. I understand these things can happen, but just wanted you to know. Hampton Inn Blue Lagoon is still my home away from home.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, really great stay!!”
Reviews.Author: iloveamerica83
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed 1 night in the Hampton Inn in September 2010. The hotel was very clean and the staff was nice. They upgrated us to a suite and the check in was very fast and efficient. The suite was huge, very clean and the bed was so comfy!! There was a kitchen, a dish washer, a micro-wave oven, free pop corn, coffee machine... The breakfast was boring, but free so i won't complain. The hotel was very quiet and secure. You have to slide your room card in the elevator to access to the upper floors. The parking was gated and free as well as the local calls and the internet access. We had a great stay and will come back hopefully during our next stay in Miami.

Reviews.Title: “great”
Reviews.Author: br828NewYork
Reviews.Content: I stayed Sept 8th- 13th. What a great place to stay. Bed were very comfortable. The hotel was close to many things. I rented a car and expected a parking charge. There was no parking fee. I stayed at the Loews on South Beach last year last year and they charge for parking what I paid for the room at the Hampton. The service was just as good. Those people at the front desk are very professsional and I think that the other hotels need to take some lessons in customer service. They never responded no to any request that I had. Truly amazing. I will be staying there again

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Hotel with Fantastic Employees”
Reviews.Author: wmrm
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 nights before leaving on a cruise and we will, definitely, stay here again and will recommend it to friends. The hotel is beautiful, very clean and very well located. They upgraded our room to a larger one and we loved it. Beautiful decor and great view. We won't forget manager Victoria Greber for her kindness, friendliness and recommendations as to where to eat authentic Cuban food and what to see. Thank you for a very enjoyable stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Locale near Airport”
Reviews.Author: jhnnybrgn
Reviews.Content: Had a great stay and the location was close to the airport and my customers. Facilities were clean and Breakfast area was spotless. Staff was extremely helpful and polite. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant Hotel for the long stay business traveller”
Reviews.Author: udrafz
Reviews.Content: I have used this Hotel for several weeks now and am extremely satisfied with it. The staff is friendly and proffessional. Rodney and Rodney always have the right answer. The breakfast as plenty of choice and I also appreciate the brown bag lunch. The rooms are large, functional, clean and quiet. Even the side that faces the airport does not get any noice from the air traffic. The Publix and restaurants across the street offer all one can ask for for a longer stay. The staff also had some good tips for sightseeing over the weekend.

Reviews.Title: “Waoooooooo Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: varondandy
Reviews.Content: I like the service ,location and great price .My recommendation i genuine don't think about twice is great deal to stay in this Hotel .

Reviews.Title: “Great all around !”
Reviews.Author: ars073
Reviews.Content: Great hotel to stay in if you are in Miami! Service was great from check in and all the way to the housekeeper. Breakfast were very well attended and kept clean. Everyone was courteous and nice! Bed was comfortable and getting sleep was no problem. Location is excellent and within walking distance to restaurants and shopping. Publix is right across the street. Parking is very secure (as you can enter by swiping room key) and most of all, free. Internet access was also free. Pool looked nice and well kept. I would definitely stay here again the next time I am in town.

Reviews.Title: “Best location, excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Frequent_Flyer02953
Reviews.Content: The entire Hapmton experience is well thought out; from the shuttle personnel being provided with a list of expected guests to the hassle-free check-out. The rooms are spacious and comfortable and the availability of CVS, Walgreens and Publix within walking distance make this hotel a must for those who prefer not to drive to obtain common amenities. The staff are all friendly, expecially those at the front desk, Jeffrey, Rodney (both of them) Sophia and Juan who greet guests by name and ensure that every need is met. I've been provided with valuable advice on the best shopping and dining areas, and I'm always welcomed back like a long-lost friend. The idea of the "breakfast on the go" is novel, and provides an additional feeling of warmth when you're tired and far away from home. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who is seeking excellent service at a competitive cost.

Reviews.Title: “Great Choice for Overnight Stay”
Reviews.Author: FlyerB
Reviews.Content: I frequently travel through Miami with early morning flights, and I have sampled nearly all of the airport area hotels. The Hampton Inn (Blue Lagoon) is my "go to" choice. Rooms are spacious, clean and in good shape. The airport shuttle is dependable, and the staff is friendly. While there are a couple dining opportunities nearby, you must cross a very busy six lane highway, so be careful.

Reviews.Title: “Near the airport, but you don't hear the planes, nice hotel!”
Reviews.Author: mattadams80
Reviews.Content: Like most hampton inns, it meets the standards just fine - safe, clean, reasonably quiet at night, and a decent place to stay! Would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: knobbiett
Reviews.Content: Prior to this most recent stay I have used this hotel because I have always found the service and staff to be good, the rooms are very comfortable and its location both to the airport and other attractions quite central and easy to get to. In short it has always been great value for me. On this last overnight stay, I have to say that my wife & I were completely blown away from the fantastic reception that we received from the front desk staff, Mr. Jeffrey Austin. We were greeted by this gentleman with such warmth and respect that we just felt quite at home. In addition to the high standards of the this hotel to which I have become accustomed, Mr. Austin was more than a breath of fresh air. If all of their staff are like him, there is likely to be no further place in Miami that I would want to stay. Highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very good location and hotel quality if you have only 2 days in Miami!”
Reviews.Author: Eugene49
Reviews.Content: The location is perfect for transit. We disembarked the RCI ship and stayed for 1.5 days for NY flight. In hotel reception ask for car rent. It is convenient (airport area you will be taken) and will compensate for distance to Ocean drive and other places. Once you have to be in terminal: the shuttle is 5 min! Rooms are roomy, clean and quiet! Parking and Business center is very good. There is big mall just over the road to do some shopping... We had a good time, exeeding our expectations!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: kaszub
Reviews.Content: We had stayed there during our trip to the Keys. It's clean, quiet and service is exceptional. I would not recommend it for someone who is looking for "Miami by Night" stuff, but definitely for someone who has a car and likes to explore different parts of town. There is a covered, gated parking, pool and gym.

Reviews.Title: “Super”
Reviews.Author: joburg1967
Reviews.Content: This is our second time at the hotel and we are even more satisfied. Everything is perfect....feels like home. Breakfast also deserves mention. The quality of food is excellent and the girls (elizabette and swania) are extremely courteous and helpful. Congratulations once again. We have recommended the hotel to our friends and will continue to do so.

Reviews.Title: “Staff makes a huge difference”
Reviews.Author: TonyDTulsa
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel for 9 hours on a layover to the Bahamas, from 2AM to 11AM. Our arrival fligt was 3 hours late due to issues with airlines, so we were exhausted and disgusted with the 'airline experience" by the time we got to the hotel. We had to pay for our cab from the airport because the shuttle stops at 1AM. I was shocked when Jeffery, the night manager asked me to get a receipt for the cab and then proceeded to re-imburse the cab fare from petty cash. He is a commensurate professional and my Wife and I both agreed that he was the most outstanding customer-service person we encountered on our entire vacation. It was not the $15.00 for cab fare, it was the consideration that made the difference. The hotel location is close to the airport with regular shuttles. We slept well and the room was clean with a great bed. Quick note about AA American Eagle at Miami going to the Bahamas- the boarding times are well ahead of the flight time due to a bus ride from the gate to your plane, so do not measure your airport arrival from the flight depature, measure it from the boarding time.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel with great staff.”
Reviews.Author: LeezakFl
Reviews.Content: I stayed one night at the property last week. I was very pleased with the staff and check in, the cleck was very nice and checked me in quickly. Parking was included ( I liked the fact that there was a gated and secure parking area). You will not have to worry about your car if you leave it while you are away (flight or cruise). The location was pretty solid with several places to eat very close by, as well as a Starbucks across the street. If I need to stay by the Miami airport again, I would look into staying at this property again.

Reviews.Title: “Good large room”
Reviews.Author: OleL
Reviews.Content: Travel with 3 children. Chose the hotel because arriving late at the airport. 2 queen beds and sleeping couch made the night comfortabel for everyone. Nice pool but not a place for a longer visitt with small children.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel Stay I have had in quite a while”
Reviews.Author: sambolin1
Reviews.Content: Recently my extended family and I took a cruise departing from Miami and we had a pre cruise stay at this hotel. First of all we were greeted by a most lovely and efficient lady. She worked magic and got us all on the same floor with nearby rooms to each other. She answered all our questions not only about the hotel and things to do but about Miami and we did have a lot of them. She made us feel at home immediately. The rooms and breakfast were great!. She saw us in the morning at breakfast and greeted us by name and inquired if there was anything else she could do for us. . She than informed us of the pickup schedule for the ships. We all were charmed by her and all of us thought that with her attractivness, knowledge and cheerfulness she could be the "Poster Face" for the hotel chain. We asked her name and it is Victoria Greber Hope you have more like her!! Sincerely Robert Sambolin & family

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: agfe539
Reviews.Content: The rooms are clean and the beds are very confortable. the employees are very nice. The breakfast was perfect and even they have bags to go. Thanks to Elizabeth and Libania for their help. I know that I'm going to stay in this Hotel next time I visit Miami

Reviews.Title: “Great way to start a vacation cruise!”
Reviews.Author: oweaver
Reviews.Content: From the airport pick-up to our departure for the cruise ship this Hampton was great. The staff was very helpful with dining suggestions, although if you're on foot there's not a lot close by other than fast food. They helped us find reasonable transportation for the day we were in town before leaving and they helped us find transport to the ship. Both the daytime and nightime shifts were great. Breakfast was very good and the food staff went beyond the extra mile to be helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Just ask, Hampton may exceed your expectations”
Reviews.Author: jsaul
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here overnight. We were flying out of Miami Int'l Airport the following morning for an island destination wedding. After checking in, we asked if Hampton would let us leave the rental car in their secured parking lot for a few days until our return. The front desk representative (Jonathan) very courteously went and checked with his manager (Christina). Not only did they say "yes", they beat the advertised online airport parking rate as a customer service gesture. What a pleasant surprise. We took their complimentary shuttle to-and-from the Miami airport. This is hospitality management at its best. Other 6-star hotels (Omni, Mandarin, W, 4 Seasons) may charge you left & right for the added service.

Reviews.Title: “Why would you stay anywhere else then Hampton Inn!”
Reviews.Author: BevyPlymouth_WI
Reviews.Content: If you want excellent service, stay at a Hampton Inn! The minute you walk into the door, you are greeted with exceptional service. Jeffrey Austin, lobby reservationist, went beyond the call of duty to accomodate my stay. I will recommend Hampton Inn to everyone. Thank you Hampton Inn for an outstanding experience!

Reviews.Title: “its a relaxing,convenient hotel”
Reviews.Author: family084
Reviews.Content: Very good location for shopping.You can start the day with a good breakfast and after shopping just relax at the swimmingpool .

Reviews.Title: “An oasis in the July, Miami heat and humidity!”
Reviews.Author: sharons77ga
Reviews.Content: A very nice room. A very nice property. The breakfast area was excellent due to Elizabeth and Lirania. The covered parking was also nice in the rain.

Reviews.Title: “A trip to Paradise in Miami”
Reviews.Author: clarkta
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in this hotel on several occasions and each time I am more impressed with the profressional and courteous staff, the outstanding and clean accomodations, and the excellent location to the airport, downtown Miami, the cruise terminal, and the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Business at it's best”
Reviews.Author: 4karate
Reviews.Content: The overall service at the Hampton is surely a pleasure after a busy and hectic long day of travel and business.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderfull Vacation”
Reviews.Author: 2010MiamiVacation
Reviews.Content: June is our yearly vacation with our family and also June 24th is our Anniversary been married 40yrs. The Hampton Inn and suites is a beautiful hotel. The rooms were very clean; the beds were so comfortable we didnâ€™t want to leave. The breakfast and the ladies who were working that area were so friendly and pleasant. The entire staff was friendly and pleasant. Thanks Again ..we will visit again in the future..

Reviews.Title: “Good Pre/Post Cruise Stay”
Reviews.Author: Momo3boys
Reviews.Content: We had a very positive experience at this hotel. We arrived at midnight and received a nice, clean room with prompt, courteous service. I felt very safe here at all times. The typical Hampton breakfast was adequate, but there's a McDonald's, Wendy's, Burger King,Subway and Starbucks within walking distance. There's also a Publix, Walgreen's and CVS nearby. The airport shuttle is convenient and free, although tips are always appreciated. From the airport, you can catch the city bus to the beach. I recommend getting the Metro card for $5.00/day, otherwise you pay for every transfer. Be sure to take the Express to the beach. You can also catch the South Beach shuttle. Be aware that the shuttles do not circle the island as they appear to on the map. You may have to get off and on more than once to get where you want to go. The current taxi rate to the Port of Miami from the hotel is $25. The hotel has a shuttle to the port for $10 a person. Be sure that you have the address of the hotel for your return visit. Our taxi driver did not know where it was, and we ended up going to the airport and catching the hotel shuttle back. Although we were close to the airport, we did not have any problems with noise and had a very restful night sleep. You may also have a view of the lagoon. Our taxi driver said that manatees are scheduled to be added to the lagoon next year. If this is true, I hope it won't affect the very reasonable hotel rates. The day we returned from the cruise we were very grateful to be able to check in early. (I requested this on our reservation.) We were able to catch up on our emails, Facebook, etc on the computers in the business area and with the WiFi in the room. We used the pool later in the day. In the afternoon, the entire pool is in the shade. This was good for our sunburns, but if you want to work on your tan, go out early. If you stay at this hotel for short stays, you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Christina Delaney, #1 in customer service”
Reviews.Author: reesegray
Reviews.Content: Primary reason for this review is to acknowledge Christina Delaney..While all the employees encountered were professional and courteous, Ms. Delaney exceeded expectations. I was having a difficult time doing advance check in for baggage for my flight. Ms. Delaney contacted the airline's customer service several times. She left and came back to check on me. If you need help that is above and beyond the norm, she's is your person. If you encounter any problems as a guest, with confidence I recommend Ms. Delaney. If she can't personally assist you I have no doubt she knows who can. Z. Gray

Reviews.Title: “Great stay as usual”
Reviews.Author: andrew50
Reviews.Content: I stay at this hotel when I travel to Miami, and always receive great service. It is convenient to the airport and to the expressway. Customer service is consistently good and the rooms are spacious and well maintained.

Reviews.Title: “Well Maintained and Clean”
Reviews.Author: sarahli07
Reviews.Content: Checked in for only one night for connecting flight the next morning. Wished I had stayed for a few more days to check out Miami in this hotel as it is clean, neat and well maintained and decent sized for the price at USD159.00+/day. We had a one bdrm with 2 queen beds and a sofa in the living area. So, it is great for a family travelling with young kids as there is room for some separate quiet time if you wish. There is also a small kitchen area with a small sink, a fridge, micro wave oven, a small table for meals. The staff were also very helpful and friendly in highlighting to us that we should return our car in the night at the airport and to take their hotel transport in the early morning at 5.30am as it will be more convenient and less stressful for us then. They were right! On our way out at 5.30am, we were surprised to see bags of take away breakfast (a bottle of water, an apple/cereal bar and a muffin) at the reception counter for guests who will miss their free breakfast starting at 6am. How thoughtful and bravo for such detail! Highly recommended and will stay at this hotel when we come back to Miami again.

Reviews.Title: “Very good place to stay near the airport”
Reviews.Author: Pippi_two
Reviews.Content: A clean, well run establishment with top-notch staff. The breakfast was well stocked with fresh foods every day. This was my second stay here and I would gladly come back again.

Reviews.Title: “Very good value and a hotel operator that tryuly cares”
Reviews.Author: roadster1111
Reviews.Content: This is a newer property and is maintained very well. Excellent location next to airport and only a few miles from downtown and less than 30 minutes in traffic to Convention Center in Miami Beach. I have stayed here at least 2 times of not 3 in my travels and they have all been nearly flawless experiences. The one minor thing that went sideways I mentioned in an email (in response to their satisfaction survey) and was promptly debriefed on the situation and was even refunded - I didn't really realize you could even get a refund. For an operator to actually offer something of such tangible value without even asking is far above and beyond and it really tells me this operator is SERIOUS about providing an excellent experience. I would gladly stay here again or any hotel operated by this company (Hospitality America).

Reviews.Title: “Good value, great service, nice free room upgrade, good breakfast, bed too soft for me, stain on furniture, stayagainYES”
Reviews.Author: Hank99
Reviews.Content: Very good value, prompt courteous shuttle service to airport close by. We came in from London flight to Miami for overnight stay before going home to Jacksonville FL. Free room upgrade from standard room to suite for the four of us, 2 adults and 2 kids. Rooms were large in suite. Beds too soft for our taste and need to be replaced as they were worn to the center. Stain on armrest of furniture. A little more attention to furniture cleanliness is needed. Breakfast buffet (included in price) was very good and the staff was courteous, effective and efficient. We had to leave at 630am on the shuttle which runs every 1/2 hour and the food was ready at 600am as scheduled. Front desk was very helpful and courteous - Great Job. Food choices across the street which was helpful as you were not locked into hotel food. Great Cuban restaurant and was recommended by staff. Room was quiet enough for us given proximity to airport. We would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Stayed in Hotel for more than 5 months...”
Reviews.Author: dhut3
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this Hotel for over a 5 month period. I was on a project and my office was located in Blue Lagoon business park. It was an easy walk to the office and back. I must say the Hotel was alway nice, clean, and the free hot breakfast was great. I usually didnt stay during the weekend, but M-F I was here. You can not beat this location! Cost from the airport is only $10 if you dont use the Hotel shuttle. It is right by Publix, Polo Tropical, Burger King, CVS, Wendys, Subway, Chicken Kitchen, Casa Juan (local Cuban place & very good), and retail shops. The service was great, and I slept like a baby everynight. Beds were very nice, and the pool was good as well. If you are in Miami for business you cant beat it, and if here for vacation I would still come if you are on a budget and cant afford Downtown, or South Beach Hotels.

Reviews.Title: “I really enjoyed my stay at the Hampton Inn - a great end to a great vacation”
Reviews.Author: Neo14
Reviews.Content: After a 10 day long haul vacation in Miami, we stayed at the Hampton Inn nr Miami Airport before our flight home. I found the location to be fine only a 10 minute drive into downtown depending on the time of day/week. We stayed there for Memorial Day weekend so it was pretty busy but I couldn't say I was effected by the volume of people or traffic at all. I never once felt the place was crowded or anything really. It's a real straight forward place to find and has good access to major routes and places within Miami. Minutes from Downtown/Bayside, Coral Gables and Coconut Grove. The staff were professional and did their best to accomodate me, allowing me to change my room at the last minute as I'm an aviation fan (and pilot) and wanted a view of the airport...it's actually quite a way from the airport, the ideal distance really, in that you won't be disturbed by aircraft noise while sleeping, but if you're due fly following your stay it's just a 5 minute journey down the road. I will definitely stay here again in the future. OK breakfast, Continental style-help yourself etc, selection changed over the 2 days we were there, lovely rooms adequate for our needs, nicely air conditioned, sound proofed windows, powerful spa and outdoor pool. Easy to use coffee maker etc....Looking forward to coming back.

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional neatness, cleanliness, and service at a Superb Value!!!”
Reviews.Author: truly77
Reviews.Content: My family was at the Hampton Blue Lagoon on Monday, June 8th, and from the start, the service was excellent! Jeffrey was very very kind, professional, and accomodating. The room at minimum paralelled Jeffrey's front desk service. Very neat, tidy, and clean. If I am ever in the Miami area again, this will be the first place that I check out!

Reviews.Title: “Five stars for security, pool, hot tub, complimentary breakfast and housekeeping.”
Reviews.Author: c_james_mailbox
Reviews.Content: I spent three nights at this Hampton Inn location during the Memorial Day weekend, May, 2010. I would strongly recommend this hotel for your next stay in the metro Miami area. I received Five Star service from: Israel (Night Manager) and from Victoria and Flor on the dayshift. C.James Atlanta

Reviews.Title: “Great and friendly customer service”
Reviews.Author: dgoodwillman
Reviews.Content: I travel to Miami annually to attend a convention and have stayed at this Hampton Inn four times since 2006. The service and staff keeps getting friendlier and truly strive to make my stay as pleasant as possible. The shuttle is great. The free wifi is a real plus. Free continental breakfast is not home made - but is filling. Close proximity to convenience stores and restaurants are a welcome. The airport is a few minutes away. When I was welcomed at the hotel early in the morning, the man behind the desk said that he wanted me to feel like this was my home away from home. Well, they deliver.

Reviews.Title: “Nicest place I've stayed”
Reviews.Author: klb1234
Reviews.Content: I arrived early and was not only able to get my room right away but to my surprise I was upgraded. That was very nice of the fron desk, The room was great as was the whole property.

Reviews.Title: “Great accomodations, service desk was very helpful, great breakfast value”
Reviews.Author: MrBeas
Reviews.Content: Jeffrey at the front desk was very helpful. Rooms were booked, so I got a suite for the same price, even though I did not ask for a discounted price. Elevator a little tricky with the key fob using to get to floors. Overall, nice hotel, good staff, slept well, quiet.

Reviews.Title: “Wish I Could Say It Was As Good As Everyone Else Has Experienced”
Reviews.Author: LovesMist
Reviews.Content: This was my second stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Miami Airport- Blue Lagoon. The first was a couple years ago with my hubby for a pre-cruise stay. While we had our share of problems that night with the elevators not working properlyâ€¦ people and kids running and shouting in the hall past midnight and a few other things, the manager contacted us and was very apologetic and asked us to try them again sometime. I remembered how wonderful it was to have the restaurants and stores within walking distance â€¦ and the shuttle service would be great to use, since I was traveling with my friend this time and we didnâ€™t want to rent a car. So I thought this hotel would be fine for a one night stayâ€¦especially with all the great reviews it continues to get. Everything was going well. We called and caught the shuttle within a few minutes. After a short line, we were checked in to our room on a higher floor away from the elevators â€¦just as I had requested. We took a little while to relax. The beds were comfortable enough. The TV worked fine. Then we decided we should go across the street and pick up a few things including some dinner. So it was then that I first used the bathroom. There was a powdery substance on top of the toilet lid. I cleaned it off with a tissue and glanced around the counter and floor. Then I noticed a lot of powder and some hair right in front of the tub. (see pic) Called the front desk and they said they would send someone up to move us. The gentleman arrived with new keys, checked out the powdery substance and apologized. We left to find our new room. It was right at the elevator bank. So I called the desk twice letting it ring numerous times. After no answer on the second attempt, we took our bags and went downstairs to request a new room. We were given another room. There were a few short hairs on the bathroom counter but we decided it was only for one night and we would make do. Though I could never get comfortable and feel like we were in a clean room. We checked out the poolâ€¦but it was a cloudy green color and decided against it. The next morning we went to breakfast. Iâ€™m sure they were trying to make it nicer than just donuts and coffeeâ€¦but the egg-like omelets looked oddâ€¦ somewhat like plastic and had an orange cheese-type substance in them. There wasnâ€™t much taste to them. The sausages looked like they were made of something other than meat. The muffins and donuts were as if they had been frozen and defrosted and were wet. The coffee was ok. I liked that they had French vanilla creamer. The staff that morning was very cheery and came by saying good morning to everyone as they passedâ€¦. and even asked to take my partially eaten plate of food for me. Thanks. The shuttle to the pier the next morning for $10 per person worked very well.

Reviews.Title: “Once again, outstanding!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: jessicanshoes1
Reviews.Content: I try to stay at this property every time i come to Miami. I love the ammeneties and the staff is always so personable. I like to stay where I feel at home as I am away from home quit a bit. It's worth the traffic to get to and look forward to my next stay next month! The breakfast team is awesome too, always there with a good moring!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Location and Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: kbk2010
Reviews.Content: My girlfriendâ€™s son was graduating from the U of M and she selected this hotel. What a great choice, the hotel was clean and convenient but thatâ€™s not was made the stay enjoyable, it was the staff. They were professional courteous and attentive. Thank you Hampton in staff for being some of the best in the business.

Reviews.Title: “My Hotel of Choice”
Reviews.Author: llaton
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this particular hotel no less than 30 times since being assigned the South Floirda District. The hospitality from the staff is unmatched! As a female traveler, security is paramount, and the need to have a key to access covered parking, along with the need for a key to access the elevators to guest room floors is much appreciated. The rooms are ALWAYS immaculate! The breakfast attendants make you feel like you are in your own kitchen with their warm smiles and accomadating behaviors. Additionally, this is a great location geographically, central to the airport and some of the best food in Miami!!!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly service.”
Reviews.Author: Sid1313
Reviews.Content: Great location, always very accomendating to my needs. Have stayed here 6 or 7 times in the last year, never disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Very disappointed”
Reviews.Author: Traveller from UK
Reviews.Content: We chose to stay for one night at the Hampton after reading all the good reviews on Trip Advisor. We have travelled extensively all over the USA so have a lot of hotels to compare this Hampton to. I can only say that we have no idea how it is so highly rated. The clerk on the front desk at check-in was quite unhelpful and didn't even ask us if we had a car to park. We had to drag the information out of him as to how and where to park. Our room was comfortable but lacked a fridge, although I know there are fridges in the suites. However, I believe that in such a hot place, all hotel rooms need a fridge. The swimming pool was small and the water was very cold and but pool towels were provided and there were plenty of loungers. The breakfast buffet was a the biggest let down for us. We have previously stayed just round the corner in the Homewood Suites and their breakfast is also complimentary. However, the Homewood suites has enough seating, china crockery and "real" cutlery. We did not enjoy eating from plastic plates with plastic knives and forks. The number of tables provided was totally inadequate for the amount of guests. Finally, my 60 year old hubby was asked for ID when we went into the hotel shop for a can of Bud. Very flattering indeed!!!! For a one night stay the hotel was acceptable but we will not be returning.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay and Service”
Reviews.Author: Ellythek
Reviews.Content: I would like to thank the staff at the Hampton for another wonderful stay. For business people, this hotel makes it easy to live on a daily budget by providing a great breakfast so the remaining daily allowance can be used for more exciting meals. The free internet and parking makes it a extremely good business value and it is centrally located to everything. This is my ninth stay since January and the staff keeps performing exceptionally well. The rooms are very spacious and clean. The fitness center is very stocked with good equipment. I do have two minor issues I would like to see addressed. The first are the carpets. They look very dirty and stained and should be cleaned or replaced. The second if the reservations system does not always match up the room with the profile. For example, my profile states no rooms next to the elevator. I am a very light sleeper and the elevator going up and down all night keeps me from getting a good nights sleep. This has happened on twice in my nine stays but the last was in April. Other then this is have been very happy with the service and accomodations. Good job all around.

Reviews.Title: “Just what was need after spending a day flying”
Reviews.Author: rodney01
Reviews.Content: Even though we only stayed 1 night , how we were treated here and the quailty of this hotel has our quaranteed return business. The experience started with Jefffery who put us at ease right away and mixed in all the right information with a friendly sense of humour. Our room was spectacular; clean, spacious and unbelievably quiet being soo close to the airport. We had a great uninterrupted night's sleep on a wonderfull bed and then enjoyed breakfast in the morning. I cannot express how nice it is to have the worry of travel to and from the airport dissapear with a shuttle service. All they need to know was the airline we were travelling with and the departure time. The only thing required of us was to show up on time. We have stayed at Hampton Inns before and this one is no exception to the quality of service they offer. Being from out of town and having a worry/hassle free stay, especially when you don't know where things are or do not have transportation is a great comfort. Thanks again

Reviews.Title: “Great place close to the airport at a reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: travlinbuddy
Reviews.Content: I travel quite a bit for work and when I stay near the Miami Airport I prefer to stay here since I know my vehicle is safe behind the gated car park. and the room was very comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “A Good Night's Sleep in the middle of a Large, Loud City”
Reviews.Author: KenE_10
Reviews.Content: Excellent Hotel !!! You would never know you're in the city unless you looked out the window.... A great, quit nights sleep !!!

Reviews.Title: “Miami in the rain!”
Reviews.Author: mudmash
Reviews.Content: An excellent location for a late night arrival. The secure and covered parking was a big plus!

Reviews.Title: “Unbeatable Fantastic Service Highly Recommended”
Reviews.Author: AshCloudrefugee
Reviews.Content: Our daughter was one of thousands stranded recently in the USA due to the Icelandic Volcanic Ash Cloud Crisis. Third hotel of the week restored our faith in mid priced hotels sourced on the Internet after two bad experiences. Friendly reception staff upon arrival clean comfortable room with free water and cookies made her feel so happy at last a real hotel who cares for their clients she told us in her text message and its has breakfast included in the room price thank you so much mum for finding this hotel for me also lovely Outdoor Pool, Jacuzzi and a well equipped gym. Upon her return to the UK she realised that she had left her Medical Bracelet by the Jacuzzi and we emailed Hotel to ask if it had been found. Promptly they emailed back a photo asking if this was the lost item which had been found which it was and today it arrived by post for which our Daughter is so very grateful to get back. A big thank you to all the Staff for their great service and attention to detail. We certainly wouldnâ€™t stay anywhere but here when we next return to Miami and will be recommending you to all our friends and business colleagues.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best hotels to stay at because of the friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: ejquall
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel for only one night, wish I had more time to stay another. Best service I have ever received at a hotel, excellent staff, extremely professional and thorough in their jobs. Great quality for the price and convience to the airport and cruise terminals. Everyone member of the staff goes out of their way to make sure you are taken care of and that all your needs are met.

Reviews.Title: “Stranded in Miami by the Icelandic Volcano!”
Reviews.Author: SandyCamberley
Reviews.Content: We were stranded at Miami Airport and had no idea when we might get a flight home. We studied the board of hotels to find one to book in to when a passing chap said "that's the one to stay at" pointing to the Hampton Inn & Suites. We took his advice, rang them and booked in and discovered this friendly haven which was to become our home for 9 days. From the moment we arrived we saw nothing but friendly faces and sympathy with our situation. An early meeting with the Sales Manager resulted in our being granted the corporate rate and all the staff could not have been more helpful. Our room was spacious and very clean and, as the days went by the staff got to know us well from the housemaid to the breakfast ladies who all greeted us with a smile. Whilst the hotel does not have a restaurant, the breakfast was excellent and with free coffee on tap all day and a microwave available for our use, we could still eat in when we wanted to. We were provided with the services of the hotel shuttle bus to a nearby restaurant and back free of charge and, what was a huge bonus, internet facilities were available free of charge so we could communicate with people back home by email. Overall, by staying at the Hampton Inn, Miami Airport our extended visit to the USA was made so much easier and comfortable and we cannot thank all the staff there enough for their help and kindness.

Reviews.Title: “We really liked this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: ace42
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a moderately priced hotel near the Miami airport. We were delighted with our stay at the Hampton Inn Miami Airport. The check-in was pleasant and efficient, the room was clean, neat and well appointed and the continental breakfast was quite satisfactory. We felt secure in the locked parking lot. I would certainly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Hampton Inn Blue Lagoon is my Miami home away from home”
Reviews.Author: SafeTraveling
Reviews.Content: The title of my review says it all. I've been traveling to Miami on business for over 2 years now and I won't consider staying anywhere else. The staff makes the difference, they are always friendly, considerate, and willing to help you with whatever need you may have. It's located just south of the MIA airport with easy access on and off the Dolphin Expressway. The area is safe and clean - I'm a runner and that's important to me to stay in an area that I can go for a run or walk without worry. One more thing, this hotel is consistent with everything, always, really.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel with friendly helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: BachusGlasgow
Reviews.Content: This is a little diamond of a hotel. Good situation and immaculately clean with really friendly and helpful staff

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, excellent service”
Reviews.Author: DRS1003
Reviews.Content: We found the Hampton Inn & Suites clean, comfortable and very convenient to Miami airport. Customer service was excellent -- in particular front desk staff Jeff Austin and Flor Villa provided fast, competent and courteous service to every request we had.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel - Convenient and Clean!!”
Reviews.Author: canuckgal33
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night when we missed a connecting flight. We took the shuttle from the airport to the hotel (runs every 30 minutes) and it is VERY close to the airport. The hotel has lots of stores right across the street (Walgreens and a grocery store). There are also several restaurants within walking distance (McDonalds and several nicer places to eat). Check in was easy and fast. The staff was very friendly. We didn't have any toiletries (as we had not been able to access our luggage at the airport)...so we were given complimentary toiletries (toothpaste, toothbrush, deodorant). The room was great. It was a nice size. We had two double beds and our room was facing the parking lot. We didn't hear any noise from outside or the next room. Super comfortable beds and pillows. Bathroom and room were immaculate!! Breakfast was included...some hot items (scrambled eggs and sausage) and lots of other choices (cereal, fruit, toast, muffins...too many items to name). You can also get a "breakfast to go" if you can't make it to the other breakfast. It was a great hotel...so great that we have booked it for our pre-cruise room next November!

Reviews.Title: “We will return”
Reviews.Author: varrey1
Reviews.Content: We have stayed a total of 4 nights in 3 trips at the Blue Lagoon. The service is excellent and they upgraded us to a suite on this last trip. We seem to get there before check-in and our room is always ready for us. If our room was not ready, we could have stayed out at the pool, go on the internet, stay in the foyer, or watch TV in the breakfast area, or shop or eat. Meanwhile they would hold our luggage. It is convenient to the airport, the cruise ship pier, shopping and fast food restaurants, etc. South Beach is only a taxi away. They have a dependable, free shuttle to and from the airport. No need to call them, they will be there in 1/2 hour. The airport is close, but no noise from airplanes. The views of the airport are great if you like to watch the incoming and outgoing flights. They have snacks, drinks, beer and who knows what else. For the suite they even have fast food to cook on the stove or in the micro. The suite is awesome! It has more than everything! The view was good 3 out of 4 times. Flor Villa at the reception desk has been exceptional in person and on the phone. She is unflappable. Since I am a Tripadvisor member, I am hoping I can add photos later. If not, I can supply the March 2010 photos easily. We had suite on the first trip to Hampton Suites in Dallas in 2001 and we got hooked.

Reviews.Title: “Easy access to all Miami has to offer at a modest price.”
Reviews.Author: cndw
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a place near the airport that we could access all Miami has to offer. We found that at the Hampton Inn - Blue Lagoon. The rooms were clean and the hotel is a secure place. The breakfast was a step above the normal Hampton exquisite fare.

Reviews.Title: “Not in the best part of town”
Reviews.Author: donnchris16
Reviews.Content: This hotel is great location to MIA airport. But not located in the best part of Miami. Need a key to access floors to the guest rooms. Big metal gate to access parking area. Hotel itself was average. Did not feel comfortable outside the hotel grounds. Stayed one night before return flight home.

Reviews.Title: “Great locatoin for arrival or departure @ MIA”
Reviews.Author: Esquimalt
Reviews.Content: Booked for one night on basis of TripAdvisor reviews. Booked following a few days driving for sightseeing in advance of a cruise. Location was perfect: able to check-in, then drop off rental car at MIA and return to hotel using their shuttle. Received an upgrade to a one bedroom suite. Wow - it would be perfect for a family or a business person staying a few days! Everything was very clean and comfortable and the staff were excellent. Having a self-serve laundry was a real bonus, giving us an opportunity to prepare clothes prior to our two week cruise. Used the gym in the morning and found it clean and reasonably equipped. Included breakfast was adequate. The shuttle service to the cruise port was very convenient and reasonably priced. I would recommend the Hampton for anyone in transit through Miami or anyone having longer stay for business in the area. If you are traveling with a car, I think it would be reasonably convenient as a base for seeing the sights of Miami. Dining choices within walking distance are a bit limited. We dinner in an Italian restaurant in a mall across from the Hampton. Food and service were good, prices OK - nothing remarkable but decent and convenient.

Reviews.Title: “Very close to airport. Great for pre-cruise.”
Reviews.Author: digitaljake
Reviews.Content: The free shuttle from MIA to hotel was busy and had to wait longer than expected (supposed to come every 30 min.), but probably because it was Super Bowl weekend. Breakfast was better than expected -- eggs, and fruit, among other good options. It was clean, decent bed, and quiet. A nice view of MIA runways. It's that close.

Reviews.Title: “Found the right place for us”
Reviews.Author: macgrej68
Reviews.Content: We had an overnight layover in Miami going to and from St. Lucia. On the way down we stayed at Fairfield Inn, but it was not a good experience, so I cancelled our return reservation and found the Hampton online with good review. Thank goodness! All of the staff were helpful and cheerful from arrival to departure. The room was pleasant and a good value. The breakfast was wonderful. This will definitely be our choice for any future layovers.

Reviews.Title: “Solid Hotel for a good price”
Reviews.Author: Bittco
Reviews.Content: The location is convenient to the airport and sightseeing in the Miami area if you are on a budget. It is either new or recently renovated. The breakfest area is nice though it might get crowded if the hotel is full. Pretty much a standard good quality Hampton Inn. My only question is the location. There is some tight security on the parking garage and it makes me wonder about the safety of the area.

Reviews.Title: “courteous and efficient”
Reviews.Author: JamesF42
Reviews.Content: Our stay, from the hotel transportation from the Miami airport to the hotel arranging a charter service to our Cruise was outstanding. The personnel at the hotel were very attentive and courteous, the hotel was clean, and the complimentary breakfast was very good. We will definitely stay at the Hampton Inn when visiting Miami. A special thanks to front desk representative, Flor, for her service in retrieving my blazer from the room and sending same to my residence. I was processing onto the cruise line when remembering, I had failed to take my blazer (jacket) from the room, I called the hotel and Flor immediately went to the room to secure the blazer ... many thanks.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, free parking!”
Reviews.Author: zanychick
Reviews.Content: i stayed here in January, with family, our flight was canceled and we stayed one night here. The shuttle was free to and from the airport and the driver was very nice! The room was ok, and we used the free whirlpool. There is a Starbucks, Mcdonalds, Subway, and Burger King in the surrounding shopping centers, so we were able to eat decently. The hotel also has breakfast to go in case you are late going to the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice and clean!”
Reviews.Author: lundymania
Reviews.Content: My friend panicked when she couldn't find her purse. The kind gentleman that picked us up at the airport in the motel shuttle took us back to the airport and told us where we should start looking. We found the purse, still on the plane, after a mechanic found it and radioed the baggage department. Your driver told us to stay at a certain place, and he would be back to get us (again) and take us back to the motel. What a kind and gracious driver to be of so much help to us. Thank you for the great assistance we received from your employee.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay before an early flight”
Reviews.Author: laudy13
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for one night prior to an early flight from Miami airport. We were very impressed. Free parking for one night, and 2 further nights cost $15 per night -- making it cheaper than the airport longstay parking. Courtesy bus transport to and from the airport was a further saving. The room was comfortable and quiet. Although there is no restaurant in the hotel, there are 3 restaurants, a supermarket and 2 drug stores within a 5 minute walk. Breakfast was included, but we had to leave before we could try it. I doubt I would use this hotel for a visit to Miami, but it was excellent value and quality for our purpose.

Reviews.Title: “Overnight Stay”
Reviews.Author: DeputyDan
Reviews.Content: Due to weather our flights out of Miami were cancelled. We booked this location on-line while still in Curacao. The shuttle service was very good. The staff at the facility was excellent (and I mean excellent) the room had not been cleaned as well as it should have been. That is my only negative. We were in too late and out too early to use the facilities such as the gym or breakfast area.

Reviews.Title: “Recent overnight stay and extended parking for a cruise out of Miami, FL”
Reviews.Author: AGuyOnTheGo
Reviews.Content: Pleasant experience at this hotel for an overnight stay. We were received with courtesy and promptness even though we arrived at the hotel about 1:30 AM. The room was spacious and clean. Comfortable bed. Took advantage of their extended parking program for travelers taking cruises. We were able to park our car for 7 nights in a gated, covered parking garage with an minimal increase in our hotel bill (saved about $120 in port parking fees). Also, we were provided with shuttle service, including luggage, to the Miami cruise port/terminal (about a 15-20 minute ride); return ride not included in the package. e did not use any other the other hotel amenities. Conveniently located within a 5 minute walk to a grocery store and 2 pharmacies. We will stay at this Hampton Inn again on our next cruise out of Miami and will recommend this option to our friends.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel: clean, comfortable, friendly staff, pool/hot tub, gym, breakfast, free wireless...”
Reviews.Author: hfeather66
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with the Hampton Inn & Suites, Miami Airport/Blue Lagoon. The rooms were clean and comfortable, the facilities quite nice (tea/coffee 24 hrs, breakfast, pool, gym), and the staff were friendly. I appreciate the hotel's environmental/sustainable efforts (dual flush toilets). I will definitely stay here again on my next visit.

Reviews.Title: “thanks to the hampton”
Reviews.Author: wivctravellers
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hampton, Blue Lagoon for one night last week. I wanted to thank the woman cleaning our room for finding my ski jacket and notifying the front desk that we had forgot it in the closet. We were already on the airport shuttle, but this allowed us to run back and get it from the front desk! The woman would not take a tip from my husband, so hopefully the thank you got passed on to her. As well, Sofia Plaza was very helpful giving me some tips and answering my questions about the general area around the hotel before we arrived! Thanks Sofia! This location is very close to the airport and port of miami.

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable and convenient”
Reviews.Author: AK717
Reviews.Content: I would stay at this Hotel when I return to Miami - great job!

Reviews.Title: “Highly Recommended”
Reviews.Author: JudyMal
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 7 nights and would highly recommned the place to anyone visiting Miami, We did not use the airport shuttle bus but it seemed to be running regularly and there were no issues. We had hired a car and felt that the place was central enough for everything we wanted to do which was to see Miami. It was a 20 minute drive to the main downtown area of Miami - Bayside etc but this did not bother us. The hotel is not very far from the airport but there was very little aeroplane noise. The lagoon was not far away and the hotel is in a quiet area. The staff were extremely friendly and very helpful - giving us information and advice for the area. The help youself breakfast buffet was delicious and varied every morning. We went for breakfast at various times between 7 & 10 and there was always plenty of choice and more than enough food. The Hampton Inn is opposite a Publix and other supermarkets/chemists and there is also a MacDonalds. We ate at the nearby 94th Aero Squadron restaurant at the end of the road a couple of times and would recommned that as a great place to eat. We made use of the swimming pool and the business centre computers. There was no problem with the parking at the Hampton Inn as this was in a secure car park under the hotel. All in all an excellent place to stay for anyone visiting Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent vacation and very helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Baje123
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel between 9 - 13 November, 2009 and the service was exceptional. All of the staff that I interacted with were very helpful in providing directions and information on nearby places. I must single out the Guest Services Manager especially who was very helpful. The location of the hotel is perfect with many restaurants and shops in walking distance. The free breakfast was also an added bonus. There is also a shuttle that takes you to Hilton Miami Airport to get the shuttle to Dolphin Mall. I would definitely stay at this hotel in the future. BJ

Reviews.Title: “Website is deceptive and takes advantage of senior citizens”
Reviews.Author: jrswynns
Reviews.Content: I reserved a room with the hotel for Dec 14-16th. I chose the best price. When my meeting was cancelled I called on October 9,2009. I was told by Yanina that should would cancel my room and I would receive a full refund. When I didn't receive a refund I called and I was informed if you choose the best price you will not receive a refund AT ALL. They inform you of this with all the fine print they claim. We never noticed it when we made the resevation. I had stayed at Hampton Inn's for years and never thought I would be treated this way by a reputable business. I would expect this at a Motel 8 but never a company run by Mariott. Beware

Reviews.Title: “airport hotel with added values”
Reviews.Author: griswolds09
Reviews.Content: convenient shuttle takes you from the airport to the hotel, however beware of just hopping in a Hampton Inn shuttle: It should clearly show "777 on the bumper" and "Blue Lagoon". Nice small lobby with quick and friendly check in. Rooms with (limited) airport view, 2 queens, microwave and small fridge. No noise from airport noticed. Some restaurants and a Publix supermarket just across the street, which is a big advantage especially when arriving from overseas. You may enjoy your first evening with roasted chicken and beer under the lovely miami temperatures :-) Hotel offers outdoor pool and hot tub. Tried many other MIA airport hotels, but the nearby supermarket of this Hampton Inn is my added value. Would most probably stay here again on my next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Near perfect-- incredible value for the money”
Reviews.Author: davidhjChicago
Reviews.Content: terrific, friendly staff-- even with hotel completely full-- Nice breakfast-- great value

Reviews.Title: “Not good, not bad. Was expecting more...”
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo76
Reviews.Content: Just came back from a three nights spent here. The hotel is quite clean. My complaint is in the room carpet which was dirty in red near my bedroom. Seemed like blood, room 804. The service is ok, not bad, not good. Internet wireless was fast and efficient. Was expecting more from breakfast. If you go to have it near 10a.m, there are only few things to choose from a disorganized breakfast table. On the other hand, i may say it is a safe hotel, where i had what was promised except because of the carpet in my room. Please, change that!!

Reviews.Title: “It was perfect”
Reviews.Author: Prof-Cesar
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is simply aewsome....My family and I, liked very much...The service was fantastic and the staff was most helpful.(Especially Rodney and Christina). The room was spaciuus, clean and tidy at all times. The hotel's location is near the airport, in close proximity to shopping and the downtown area. It has a fantastic gym, swimming pool and a excellent complimentary breakfast and free wireless access. We totally enjoyed our stay here. We would recommend to any other traveller and next year We'll intend to return to Hampton Inn;

Reviews.Title: “Can't ask for more, so greatÂ¡Â¡Â¡”
Reviews.Author: tousatraveler
Reviews.Content: My husband and i had a short stay for business in this hotel, we pick this one based in the trip advisor recomendations, thanks travelersÂ¡Â¡Â¡Â¡Â¡ The hotel have the perfect location to access whatever you need: malls, restaurant, banks, etc, etc. Comfortable room and bathroom, extra clean, great amenities, the best bedding everÂ¡Â¡Â¡ The best staff we had found so far, breakfast soooo gooood, great coffee, no restaurant, but who need a restaurant inside with so many choices aroundÂ¡Â¡Â¡ Free shuttle from and to the airport in comfortable vans, and if you want to drive yourself free and secure parking. Of course, excelent value for everything we received. I totally reccomended and hope they keep this way o become even better (which is difficult considering how good they are) Definitely the hotel we will stay our next trips.

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT”
Reviews.Author: ja_marinho
Reviews.Content: The room is very comfortable and the good location because is near the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic and Accomodating”
Reviews.Author: Stephen_C_J
Reviews.Content: The service was fantastic and the staff was most helpful.(Especially Rodney and Christina). The room was clean and tidy at all times. The hotel's location was fantastic near the airport, in close proximity to shopping and the downtown area. It has a fantastic gym and complimentary wireless access. we totally enjoyed our stay here. we would recommend to any other traveller.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: mach3man
Reviews.Content: We got in late Miami (about 1:00am) and already had reservations here. Checked in quickly and got to our rooms, which were clean and comfortable. Wake up call came as requested at 4:45am so we could catch another flight. Breakfast wasn't served before we left; got the "breakfast to go" (in a bag). Not great, but ate most of it anyway (though the bottle of water was confiscated by TSA at the airport).

Reviews.Title: “Not the best”
Reviews.Author: floridatraveler15
Reviews.Content: I took my wife and children here I don't understand all of the great reviews for this place! It was a very mediocre hotel and we had to stay their because it was so close to the airport. The area was not the best, the services were okay, and the room were very dated and not that clean.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay pre-cruise”
Reviews.Author: meggyinboston
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel the night before we were to leave on a cruise for a friends wedding. The place was nice and clean. The key to our room didn't work, but they were quick to fix the problem and let us into our room, which they upgraded us (to a suite) for free. The free continental breakfast was great, as was the pool and jacuzzi. The only down side to this is that the neighborhood seemed a little rough. However, across the street we had a great dinner at a cuban restaurant that was great!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, clean, affordable hotel”
Reviews.Author: SK1994
Reviews.Content: Wonderful, helpful person at the front desk, offered directions to where we were headed. Provided some tips for the area. Hotel was well maintained, room was nice, decent breakfast. Free internet and free, secure parking. For the price, you couldn't beat it. Would definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely stay at Hampton Inn Bklue Lagoon”
Reviews.Author: Netsanet
Reviews.Content: Had a lovely stay this week at Hampton inn, Blue Lagoon. Comfortable clean room and friendly staff (especially Marlene and the staff at the front desk). They were very accommodating. I also appreciated the breakfast which was included i n the hotel price. Would definitely choose to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Really Excellent Hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: SILVINILS
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel at Miami, for more than an overnight stay, clean, bright, nice staff, free internet, all you need for a perfect stay. If you're looking for a hotel near the Miami Airport or in this area of Miami, here is the Place!! really , don't hesitate and book know !! Thank you for a very great stay!!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect - Best Hampton Inn ever”
Reviews.Author: hilburno
Reviews.Content: This is the best Hampton Inn in which I have ever stayed. It is beautiful. The rooms are nicely furnished and the bed is unbelievably comfortable. The breakfast room is large and the food was good. They also have a relaxing pool and jacuzzi. The customer service was top notch. They allowed us to put our bags in storage and hang out by the pool after our check-out time because we had an evening flight. They couldn't have been nicer. There are lots of stores and restaurants nearby and a Publix supermarket. And the cost was under $100 (using my AAA discount). It is one of the best deals for a hotel I have found. I felt as if I were staying in a 4-Star hotel for a 2-Star price. Perfect!

Reviews.Title: “a place to stay”
Reviews.Author: pebau
Reviews.Content: For a 2-day forced break during a biz trip I was looking for a hotel close to Miami airport, and the search engine brought up Hampton Inn. Upon arrival I found a place which was simply perfect for me: prompt complimentary airport fetching & delivery; nice, clean room; gym & pool; staff that was extremely helpful, alert, and friendly, but without overdoing in any way; and, most important for me: free Wifi that really worked out of the box and with great bandwidth. There are various places for dining and a little shopping around. All in all, great value for money. It's the kind of place I will remember to book again whenever coming back to Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay - Staff took great care of us.”
Reviews.Author: dawbjw
Reviews.Content: We were returning from a cruise and spent a day in Miami and wanted a hotel near the airport. We chose this hotel and we were glad we did. The staff was very efficient, courteous, and treated us well. They took pride in their work and it showed - especially the airport shuttle crew - not only got us to the airport, but shuttled us to a local restaurant during our stay. Also, the fellow that was working the breakfast area was very helpful and had it well kept and supplied. We would stay at this hotel again in a second.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel and great location, nice suite, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: shazee
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hampton Inn & Suites- Miami Airport/Blue Lagoon prior to going on a 7 day Carnival cruise. We booked a suite for six of us, my husband, my parents, and our two teenagers. The suite was "sweet!" It had 2 queen sized beds, a pull out sofa sleeper for the kids, a big screen tv, coffee pot, frig, microwave, dishwasher, stove, dishes. The beds were very comfortable. The staff was very friendly. The continental breakfast was very good. The hotel has a great location. Across the street is a Walgreen's, CVS pharmacy, a nice grocery store, Burger King. They have a complimentary shuttle that picked us up at the airport. My cousin's plane was delayed and they picked them up at almost 1 oclock in the morning! They have a contract with a shuttle service that took us the Port of Miami for $10 pp. This hotel is very nice and clean. We would totally recommend this hotel to anyone! We got soda for the cruise at the grocery store across the street and got some things we forgot at home. The hotel is smoke-free! I am glad we found this hotel on Trip Advisor. They definitely get a thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: “Hampton Inn's are always the best place to stay”
Reviews.Author: MargaritaOhio
Reviews.Content: We were very impressed with this Hampton Inn. We had a late flight and they had a late night shuttle to transfer us to the hotel. We were totally exhausted and we were greeted by a friendly staff that were very helpful. The breakfast in the morning was outstanding. You could sit inside or outside by the pool area, and enjoy the morning sunshine. We would definately go back to this Hampton Inn because of the excellent rating.

Reviews.Title: “Our Stay Was Excellent”
Reviews.Author: C_MWashington
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the Miami Hampton Blue Lagoon for an over-nighter after our cruise. Our cruise was into port early morning and had provided transportation to the airport,. Once at the airport I called the hotel to see about an early check-in. I was greeted by friendly young man at the front desk who said said he could accomodate our early arrival and the Hampton shuttle ran every 30 minutes and would be coming by our location any minute to pick us up. The driver helped with our bags both at the airport and the hotel. You could tell he was just a nice person. Same thing with the person at the front desk, personable, friendly, and helpful. The facilities are very nice. Large rooms, firm beds, very clean, nice pool area. We were unable to take advantage of the breakfast, but the young man at the front desk (again very nice) gave my wife and I a bag snack to tide us over till our flight departed. Our short stay was excellent. C & M

Reviews.Title: “Great for Layovers”
Reviews.Author: Coastlvr
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hampton Inn - Blue Lagoon twice. Once before our international flight, and again when we returned. The room was large, quiet, very clean and had a very comfortable bed. The front desk staff was friendly and efficient. The complimentary breakfast was adequate and was more than a continental. One problem we had was that we originally checked in after 10:00pm and there was nowhere to get any food. There were several fast food places within walking distance, but unless you have a car for the drive-through, you're stuck. If you'll be arriving late, be sure to get food in the airport before you catch the shuttle to the hotel. I would stay at this hotel again if my travels bring me to the Miami airport again.

Reviews.Title: “Best Choice around Airport and nearby areas”
Reviews.Author: padnegro
Reviews.Content: Excellent Hotel with very good rates for Miami; incredibily quiet for a Hotel nearby the Airport, in a very good neighborhood and plenty of services around Except if you demand a stay in the beach and at oceanfront, this the hotel to choose Staff is outstanding, will treat you very well Rooms are very good, with all amenities, fridge, microwave, safe and Central quiet A/C Breakfast is excellent and complimentary Stayed there for several times now, I do recommend

Reviews.Title: “safe and clean option for travelers near the Miami airport”
Reviews.Author: sallygal
Reviews.Content: I spent hours searching for somewhere decent to stay for one night near the airport since we were driving back from the Keys and leaving for an early 8am flight. From this website and others it is pretty clear that there are few clean, comfortable, and safe options near the Miami airport, even among the national chain hotels. This one was just fine. We arrived the evening, my husband returned the rental car (that took over ONE HOUR!) and we had a good sleep, fast morning breakfast there, then caught the free shuttle to the airport with no problems. The front desk person was a bit slow, taking several calls while we checking in, so that it seemed to take forever for us to get our rooms keys. Otherwise, it was a great stay. The rooms are updated, clean, and serviceable. The hot morning breakfast (included) was great. The pool looked good (although we didn't use it). Hampton Inn is doing a great job with the small details that make its hotels much more user friendly, especially for business travelers. Location for the airport or access to highways is good, but there isn't much else to recommend the neighborhood. There aren't restaurant options in the area of the hotel, so it is best to eat before you head in. This is a safe and clean option near the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Good, comfortable, dependable Hampton that's starting to need updating”
Reviews.Author: sewaterman
Reviews.Content: Good Hampton Inn - comfortable, dependable, excellent soundproofing [could see the planes from the 11th floor but couldn't hear them, nor could we hear the elevators & our room was next to them] great breakfast & very helpful staff. Excellent location & good price. But ...
